item.title: Dan Aykroyd Is Right About Ghostbusters 6
item.description: Ghostbusters 6 has a lot of potential to take the franchise into the future and provide a new direction, but it needs to leave the past behind.

item.title: Lilo & Stitch Trailer
item.description: Disney releases a new teaser for the upcoming live-action Lilo & Stitch remake, referencing a fun scene from the animated original from 2002.

item.title: Lilo & Stitch Trailer References Key Scene From Original Animated Movie In Live-Action
item.description: Disneyâ€™s upcoming live-action Lilo & Stitch remake gets a new trailer, putting a fun twist on a scene from the beloved 2002 animated movie.
